title: LF ranked team (Sup/top/mid Main)
body:
Title says it all, first go at 5s teams have exp in silver 3 last season on EU SoloQ. Back in OCE and looking to get into ranked teams for a change, i main support/top/mid (basically i can play anything but ADC, but excell with unconventional supports (current favourite is yorick / jinx combo, next to annie or lulu / x) as well as tank tops and AP mids.

Doctor Jekyll if you wanna give it a shot, have all the Voice programs as well as a working mic/headset.

replies.body: add me and we can talk
